languages.text: Маленький аванпост, населенный пятью сотнями подданных, представляет из себя закопавшийся в песок небольшой добывающий комплекс, развернутый еще при Теодоре, и пять жилых модулей, расходящихся от него лучами. Смуглые обитатели его поддерживают колонию в аскетичном порядке, регулярно молятся Богу-Императору и трудятся не покладая натруженных рук.

A small outpost, inhabited by five hundred subjects, is a small mining complex buried in the sand, deployed under Theodora, and five residential modules radiating out from it. Its dark-skinned inhabitants keep the colony in austere order, regularly pray to the God-Emperor and toil diligently and without rest.
languages.original_text: Маленький аванпост, населенный пятью сотнями подданных, представляет из себя закопавшийся в песок небольшой добывающий комплекс, развернутый еще при Теодоре, и пять жилых модулей, расходящихся от него лучами. Смуглые обитатели его поддерживают колонию в аскетичном порядке, регулярно молятся Богу-Императору и трудятся не покладая натруженных рук.

Its dark-skinned inhabitants keep the colony in austere order, regularly pray to the God-Emperor and toil diligently and without rest.

Its dark-skinned inhabitants keep the colony in austere order, regularly pray to the God-Emperor and toil diligently and without rest.

languages.text: 这是一座小型前哨站，居住着五百位臣民。它是一座地处沙漠之下的小型居民点，是在西奥多拉的授意下建立起来，用作采矿用的。五片居住区域从殖民地向外辐射。在这里，皮肤黝黑的居民维持着殖民地俭朴的秩序。他们不辞辛苦地劳作，按时向神皇祈祷。
languages.original_text: A small outpost, inhabited by five hundred subjects, is a small mining complex buried in the sand, deployed under Theodora, and five residential modules radiating out from it. Its dark-skinned inhabitants keep the colony in austere order, regularly pray to the God-Emperor and toil diligently and without rest.

traits.locale_text: 这是一座小型前哨站，居住着五百位臣民。它是一座地处沙漠之下的小型居民点，是在西奥多拉的授意下建立起来，用作采矿用的。五片居住区域从殖民地向外辐射。在这里，皮肤黝黑的居民维持着殖民地俭朴的秩序。他们不辞辛苦地劳作，按时向神皇祈祷。

languages.text: 500人の臣民が住む小さな前哨拠点。シオドーラの命のもとに作り上げられた、砂に埋もれた小さな採掘施設と、そこから放射状に広がる5つの居住モジュールからなる。浅黒い肌をした住民たちはコロニーで禁欲的な生活を保ち、定期的に神帝陛下に祈りを捧げ、休むことなく勤勉に働いている。
languages.original_text: A small outpost, inhabited by five hundred subjects, is a small mining complex buried in the sand, deployed under Theodora, and five residential modules radiating out from it. Its dark-skinned inhabitants keep the colony in austere order, regularly pray to the God-Emperor and toil diligently and without rest.

traits.locale_text: 500人の臣民が住む小さな前哨拠点。シオドーラの命のもとに作り上げられた、砂に埋もれた小さな採掘施設と、そこから放射状に広がる5つの居住モジュールからなる。浅黒い肌をした住民たちはコロニーで禁欲的な生活を保ち、定期的に神帝陛下に祈りを捧げ、休むことなく勤勉に働いている。

languages.text: Un pequeño puesto avanzado habitado por quinientas almas comprende un complejo minero enterrado en la arena que ordenó instalar Theodora y los cinco módulos residenciales que lo rodean. Sus habitantes de piel tostada mantienen un orden austero, rezan con regularidad al Dios Emperador y trabajan constantemente sin descansar.
languages.original_text: A small outpost, inhabited by five hundred subjects, is a small mining complex buried in the sand, deployed under Theodora, and five residential modules radiating out from it. Its dark-skinned inhabitants keep the colony in austere order, regularly pray to the God-Emperor and toil diligently and without rest.

traits.locale_text: Un pequeño puesto avanzado habitado por quinientas almas comprende un complejo minero enterrado en la arena que ordenó instalar Theodora y los cinco módulos residenciales que lo rodean. Sus habitantes de piel tostada mantienen un orden austero, rezan con regularidad al Dios Emperador y trabajan constantemente sin descansar.

languages.text: Fondé du temps de Théodora, cet avant-poste de cinq cents âmes est un petit complexe minier enfoui dans le sable et entouré de cinq modules résidentiels. Ses habitants à la peau sombre y font régner un ordre austère, prient régulièrement l'Empereur-Dieu et se tuent à la tâche avec diligence.
languages.original_text: A small outpost, inhabited by five hundred subjects, is a small mining complex buried in the sand, deployed under Theodora, and five residential modules radiating out from it. Its dark-skinned inhabitants keep the colony in austere order, regularly pray to the God-Emperor and toil diligently and without rest.

traits.locale_text: Fondé du temps de Théodora, cet avant-poste de cinq cents âmes est un petit complexe minier enfoui dans le sable et entouré de cinq modules résidentiels. Ses habitants à la peau sombre y font régner un ordre austère, prient régulièrement l'Empereur-Dieu et se tuent à la tâche avec diligence.

languages.text: Ein kleiner Außenposten, der von fünfhundert Untertanen bewohnt wird und einen kleinen Minenkomplex im Sand hat. Dieser wurde unter Theodora gebaut, und hat fünf Wohnmodule, sie aus dem Sand hervorragen. Die dunkelhäutigen Bewohner der Kolonie halten eine strenge Ordnung aufrecht, beten regelmäßig zum Gottimperator und arbeiten unermüdlich und ohne Pause.
languages.original_text: A small outpost, inhabited by five hundred subjects, is a small mining complex buried in the sand, deployed under Theodora, and five residential modules radiating out from it. Its dark-skinned inhabitants keep the colony in austere order, regularly pray to the God-Emperor and toil diligently and without rest.

traits.locale_text: Ein kleiner Außenposten, der von fünfhundert Untertanen bewohnt wird und einen kleinen Minenkomplex im Sand hat. Dieser wurde unter Theodora gebaut, und hat fünf Wohnmodule, sie aus dem Sand hervorragen. Die dunkelhäutigen Bewohner der Kolonie halten eine strenge Ordnung aufrecht, beten regelmäßig zum Gottimperator und arbeiten unermüdlich und ohne Pause.

languages.text: Beş yüz kişiden oluşan bu küçük karakol; Theodora tarafından kurulan, kuma gömülü, küçük bir maden kompleksidir. Merkezden dışarı doğru uzanan beş yerleşim modülü mevcuttur. Siyah tenli sakinleri, kolonide katı bir düzen kurmuş vaziyette. Düzenli olarak Tanrı İmparator'a dua ediyor, özenle ve dinlenmek bilmeden çalışıyorlar.
languages.original_text: A small outpost, inhabited by five hundred subjects, is a small mining complex buried in the sand, deployed under Theodora, and five residential modules radiating out from it. Its dark-skinned inhabitants keep the colony in austere order, regularly pray to the God-Emperor and toil diligently and without rest.

traits.locale_text: Beş yüz kişiden oluşan bu küçük karakol, Theodora tarafından kurulan, kuma gömülü, küçük bir madencilik kompleksi. Merkezden dışarı doğru uzanan beş yerleşim modülü mevcut. Siyah tenli sakinleri, kolonide katı bir düzen kurmuş durumda. Düzenli olarak Tanrı İmparator'a dua ediyor, özenle ve dinlenmek bilmeden çalışıyorlar.
